item.description: [...] Ireland seems like the perfect place to celebrate OneWebDay — let us know what you’re planning. [...]
item.content:encoded: [...] Ireland seems like the perfect place to celebrate OneWebDay — let us know what you’re planning. [...]

item.title: By: Susan Crawford
item.dc:creator: Susan Crawford
item.description:
Hello -- Ireland is the perfect place to celebrate OneWebDay. We'd love to know what you're thinking about so that we can link to your plans. Something outdoors, involving wireless, and good deeds -- something that celebrates the web -- something Irish and Web 2.0.
Hope to hear more. susan
item.content:encoded:
Hello — Ireland is the perfect place to celebrate OneWebDay. We’d love to know what you’re thinking about so that we can link to your plans. Something outdoors, involving wireless, and good deeds — something that celebrates the web — something Irish and Web 2.0.

Hope to hear more. susan
